abstract: Stocks edge slowly higher as investors await news on deal between Greece and its creditors that appears to be making progress.
lead_paragraph: Stocks added to gains from Monday, as reports from Europe suggested that Greece’s proposals for budget savings appeared to have won initial approval.

headline.main: Shares Eke Out Gains as Investors Watch Debt Talks With Greece
headline.print_headline: Shares Climb as Investors Watch Greek Debt Talks

snippet: Stocks added to gains from Monday, as reports from Europe suggested that Greece’s proposals for budget savings appeared to have won initial approval.
